name: Up on Top
description: Since 2001, the mission of UP ON TOP has been to provide opportunities and experiences to children of low-income families in San Francisco (primarily in the Western Addition and Tenderloin neighborhoods), enabling them to create and achieve individual successes in school, in community and in life. The UP ON TOP program is academically-focused and incorporates recreational activities, enrichment experiences and social interactions into a broad and diverse curriculum. fullDescription: Since 2001, the mission of UP ON TOP has been to provide opportunities and experiences to children of low-income families in San Francisco (primarily in the Western Addition and Tenderloin neighborhoods), enabling them to create and achieve individual successes in school, in community and in life. The UP ON TOP program is academically-focused and incorporates recreational activities, enrichment experiences and social interactions into a broad and diverse curriculum. whatTheyOffer: Up On Top's mission is to provide YEAR-ROUND, TUITION-FREE after-school and summer programs, consisting of academic assistance, enrichment opportunities, recreational activities, neighborhood exploration, community service and family support services to K-5th grade students and their families Further, UP ON TOP provides employment and professional training opportunities to ALL STUDENTS who complete our program.
